		                    Late Stage Ovarian Low Malignant Potential Tumors (Stage III and IV)
		                    Treatment for late stage ovarian low malignant potential tumor may be hysterectomy, bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, and omentectomy. A lymph node dissection may also be done.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials
